languages.text: "Каждый слуга Империума должен исполнять предписанный ему долг... и сердце мое радуется от того, что мой долг — уничтожать ересь, а не гнить среди бумаг".
"Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."
languages.original_text: "Каждый слуга Империума должен исполнять предписанный ему долг... и сердце мое радуется от того, что мой долг — уничтожать ересь, а не гнить среди бумаг".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “帝国的每位仆人都必须履行他们的既定职责……我发自内心地庆幸，我的职责是消灭异端，而不是在堆积如山的文件下慢慢腐烂。”
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的每位仆人都必须履行他们的既定职责……我发自内心地庆幸，我的职责是消灭异端，而不是在堆积如山的文件下慢慢腐烂。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Tous les serviteurs de l'Imperium doivent accomplir le devoir qui leur incombe... et mon cœur se réjouit d'être chargé d'anéantir l'hérésie, et pas de crouler sous une montagne de papiers. »
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les serviteurs de l'Imperium doivent accomplir le devoir qui leur incombe... et mon cœur se réjouit d'être chargé d'anéantir l'hérésie, et pas de crouler sous une montagne de papiers. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Todo sirviente del Imperium debe cumplir su deber asignado... pero mi corazón se alegra de que mi deber sea aniquilar la herejía y no gestionar montañas de papeleo».
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: «Todo sirviente del Imperium debe cumplir su deber asignado... pero mi corazón se alegra de que mi deber sea aniquilar la herejía y no gestionar montañas de papeleo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「帝国の従者はすべからく、与えられた聖務を果たさなくてはならない…私の心は異端を打ち砕くという聖務に喜び震えている。書類の山に埋もれて腐るのは違う」
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の従者はすべからく、与えられた聖務を果たさなくてはならない…私の心は異端を打ち砕くという聖務に喜び震えている。書類の山に埋もれて腐るのは違う」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Jeder Diener des Imperiums muss die ihm zugeteilte Pflicht erfüllen ... Und mein Herz frohlockt, dass meine Pflicht darin besteht, die Ketzerei zu zerstören, und nicht darin, unter einem Haufen Papier zu verrotten."
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Diener des Imperiums muss die ihm zugeteilte Pflicht erfüllen ... Und mein Herz frohlockt, dass meine Pflicht darin besteht, die Ketzerei zu zerstören, und nicht darin, unter einem Haufen Papier zu verrotten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un her hizmetkârı, kendisine verilen vazifeyi yerine getirmekle yükümlüdür... Vazifemin kâğıt yığınlarının altında çürümek değil de kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak olduğunu bilmek, yüreğimi rahatlatıyor."
languages.original_text: "Every servant of the Imperium must fulfil their prescribed duty... and my heart rejoices that my duty is to destroy heresy, not to rot under a pile of papers."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un her hizmetkârı, kendisine verilen vazifeyi yerine getirmekle yükümlüdür... Vazifemin kâğıt yığınlarının altında çürümek değil de kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak olduğunu bilmek, yüreğimi rahatlatıyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
